Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Irving Park
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison, and Central, due to street blockage near Central/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison, and Central, due to street blockage near Central/Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: Red Line service resumes its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute. Shuttle Bus Fullerton to Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.  

Shuttle Bus service available Fullerton to Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due to earlier police activity.

Allow extra travel time.
